metadata.title: CVE-2023-4075 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Cast in Google Chrome prior to 115.0.5790.170 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
